{"id":1191234259,"question_id":724,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1709360011,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1191234259/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"45.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int pivotIndex(int[] nums) {\n        int n = nums.length;\n        // left prefix\n        int[] lp = new int[n];\n        lp[0] = nums[0];\n        for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {\n            lp[i] = lp[i - 1] + nums[i];\n        }\n        // right prefix\n        int[] rp = new int[n];\n        rp[n - 1] = nums[n - 1];\n        for (int i = n - 2; i >= 0; i--) { // Corrected loop condition\n            rp[i] = rp[i + 1] + nums[i]; // Corrected index access\n        }\n        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            if (lp[i] == rp[i]) {\n                return i; // Corrected to return the index directly\n            }\n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
